Installation:
    sudo apt update
    sudo apt upgrade
    sudo apt install kde-plasma-desktop sddm # task-kde-desktop for additional apps
    # sudo apt install --no-install-recommends kde-plasma-desktop sddm # for minimalist, require hardwork


After installation:
    sudo systemctl enable sddm
    sudo reboot


Before Installation:
    check if is there are privious kde plasma packages exist, if so then purge again:
        dpkg -l | grep -E 'kde|plasma|kwin|sddm' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs sudo apt purge
        sudo apt autoremove --purge
